::SnowCat::

"I have no guns. No other weapon other than the ones the Matrix gave 
me.  Please come out. No harm shal come to you. You have my word as a 
Keeper of the Matrix, you shall not be harmed."  She smiled and sat 
down on her haunches. Her tail slightly twitching. She purred to 
him. "I shall not harm you.  I have no cause to harm you.  Be you a 
maximal Or Predacon. I shall offer you my friendship and respect. Of 
this I give freely to you. Please emerge from there and make yourself 
known. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rattrap:
> 
> 
> Rattrap looked around, trying to find a way out of his situation. 
He 
> found it was stupid to follow that cat. He didn't know what got 
into 
> his head. 
> 
> "Ya drop yer guns first!" he said.
